articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Migok Cooperative Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Migok Cooperative Farm
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Thrice Three-Revolution Red Flag Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City alive with the drive for this year's farming. 
					 He went round the renovated Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 Looking at the historic relics displayed there, he said the village of Migok turned into a people's paradise visited by bumper harvests thanks to the wise leadership and meticulous care of President Kim Il Sung, adding his undying revolutionary exploits would shine forever in the history of the country. 
					
					 He highly appreciated the laudable achievements made by the farm in the past. 
					
					 He looked round a mud snail breeding ground newly built by the farm. 
					
					The practical experience gained by different farms proves that the method of manuring and cultivating paddy fields by use of mud snails is advantageous for boosting the rice yield while significantly cutting down manpower and the consumption of agricultural chemicals, he noted, underscoring the need for all farms to round off the method and widely apply it. 
					
					 Pointing out that the present trend of agricultural development is to do organic farming without using chemical fertilizers and herbicide, he said that to this end it is necessary to actively apply organic and other new farming methods and farming technologies. 
					
					 He walked along the ridge between paddy fields of the Crop-Raising Team No. 1 of the farm despite cold wind to acquaint himself in detail with its preparations for farming.
					
					 He repeatedly expressed satisfaction over the fact that the farm has turned into a socialist fairyland.  Feasting his eyes on modern houses and cozy, neat and tidy cultural and welfare facilities, he said that the more one sees the village, the more beautiful it looks. 
					
					 That day he met with heads of work teams and sub-work teams who distinguished themselves in grain production and gave a warm pep talk to them.
					
					  Wherever one goes in co-op fields, one can find many ardent patriots who have single-mindedly upheld the party with agricultural production, he said, stressing that the best socialist rural economy system in the DPRK is growing stronger as the days go by as such dependable and true revolutionaries in the rural areas are working hard at the agricultural posts. 
					
					 He advanced important tasks facing the farm. 
					
					 He said that a solid foundation for drastically increasing the agricultural production was laid thanks to the strenuous efforts made by people in different parts of the country for rural construction in recent years weathering manifold difficulties. 
					
					 These shining successes provide a sure guarantee for finally solving the issues of agriculture, farmer and the countryside in our country and opening the gate to a thriving nation with dignity, he stressed.
					
					 The three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural, now brisk in the countryside and intensified assistance to the countryside and more effective state guidance to the cooperative farms promoted the drive to assimilate the farmers to the working class, industrialize the agriculture and face-lift the countryside, thus remarkably narrowing the distinction between the urban and rural areas, he said.
					
					 This is a striking demonstration of the validity and great vitality of the socialist rural theses put forward by the President and the advantageous socialist rural economy system of the country, he noted. 
					
					 Noting that the agricultural front is the major front in the struggle to improve the people's standard of living, he called upon the whole country and all the people to continue focusing all efforts on farming in order to bring about a decisive turn in the agricultural production.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the farm would creditably perform pioneer's role in implementing the WPK's agriculture-first policy this year, too. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek and First Vice Department Directors Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Art Performance Goes on in Hamhung
articles.content:
Art Performance Goes on in Hamhung
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- An art performance given by artistes of the South Hamgyong Provincial Art Troupe and national art organizations for celebrating the completion of the modern vinalon factory, which brought about a great auspicious event of the whole country, is going on at the Hamhung Grand Theatre.
					 Narration and chorus "A Great Auspicious Event of the Whole Country", female solo "Thank You, Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and female quartet "Vinalon, Pride of My Country" made the audience recollect the fact that the history of the development of the Juche-based vinalon industry was made thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					In male solo "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", female quintet and chorus "Let's Drink a Toast", narrations and choruses ""Our Country Is Witnessing Changes," "Push Back the Frontiers of Science" and other numbers of diverse genres the performers sang of the undying feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has made his big efforts to turn the February 8 Vinalon Complex into a combined large chemical base in the era of Songun.
					
					 They sang high praises of the Korean workers who worked such miracle as completing the vast construction project in a short span of time through the display of popular heroism and matchless devotion, true to the noble intention of the peerlessly great persons.

articles.title: Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex Proves Worth of Self-reliance
articles.content:
Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex Proves Worth of Self-reliance
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The workers of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are making an unprecedented upsurge in production in high spirits to glorify this year greeting the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea with increased production.
					When visiting the complex in March Juche 98 (2009) General Secretary Kim Jong Il praised them for having built an efficient electric arc furnace in a short span of time to turn out high-grade molten iron in large quantities, appreciating the great achievement gained by their revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 Self-reliance is a tradition of the complex.
					
					 Just before the liberation of the country, the Hwanghae Iron Works, the precursor of the complex, was totally destroyed by the Japanese imperialists but its workers rehabilitated it on an expansion basis in a short period and boosted iron and steel production, contributing to the building of a new country.
					
					 In the postwar period, they replaced the 50-ton-capacity open-hearth furnace, destroyed by the U.S. imperialists during the war, with a 100-ton-capacity one by themselves in less than a year, demonstrating the mettle of the Korean people once again.
					
					 The complex, however, had sharply declined in productivity owing to the imperialists' intensified anti-DPRK campaign during the "Arduous March," forced march, which was recorded as most rigorous years in the history of the Republic.
					
					 But it made another exertion, believing in their strength, to build coke-free steel-making facilities on a large and modern basis, including an UHP electric arc furnace and continuous roughing shop, and raise the production considerably.
					
					 Its experience shows that self-reliance is a key to effecting an uninterrupted upsurge in socialist construction and a treasured sword for victory.

articles.title: KCNA Censures Plot behind UN Human Rights Council
articles.content:
KCNA Censures Plot behind UN Human Rights Council
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The United States is using the meeting of the United Nations Human Rights Council now under way in Geneva as a platform for hatching a politically motivated sinister plot against the DPRK.
					 The U.S. is running the whole gamut of cynical ploys to gather together its followers in a bid to cook up an anti-DPRK resolution which calls for keeping the "special rapporteur on human rights issue in north Korea" as he is, etc. at the meeting. 
					
					 This is another unpardonable infringement upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and a wanton violation of human rights and democracy.
					
					 Such ridiculous burlesque orchestrated by the U.S. is aimed at tarnishing the image of the dignified DPRK and, furthermore, bringing down the ideology and system in the DPRK.
					
					 Human rights mean national sovereignty and vice versa.
					
					 The U.S. has long wantonly violated the sovereignty and rights of other countries and peoples, abusing human rights and democracy, the universally accepted idea of the international community, as levers for aggression and interference in their internal affairs.
					
					 This outrageous "human rights" racket of the U.S. has mercilessly trampled down upon the democratic rights of many countries and nations of the world to set up social systems suited to their actual conditions and in line with the requirements of their peoples and live an independent life. 
					
					 The original aim sought by the international community in creating the UN Human Rights Council in 2006 which replaced the UN Committee on Human Rights is to put an end to the persistent arbitrary practices of the U.S. in the international arena dealing with human rights.
					
					 At first the U.S. worked hard to scuttle the efforts to create the above-said council, but, finding it hard to thwart them any longer, made a U-turn all of a sudden in a bid to achieve its sinister aim. It pretended to be a supporter of the move and joined it. 
					
					 What the U.S. has done since it made its way to the council is that it has only defended the human rights abuses by such countries as Israel and infringed upon the sovereignty of anti-U.S. independent countries including Cuba.
					
					 By keeping "special human rights rapporteurs," in particular, as its mere marionettes the U.S. seeks to politicize the human rights issues and use them for dealing with these issues according to double-standards in a selective manner.
					
					 The DPRK has never recognized the ghost-like "special rapporteur on human rights issue in north Korea", a leftover of the already defunct UN Committee on Human Rights, and categorically turned down the illegal resolutions on the DPRK.
					
					 If the UN Human Rights Council is to develop its activities as desired by the international community opposed to politicization, selectivity and double-standards on human rights, it should appoint, to begin with, a special rapporteur taking issue with the U.S., the world's worst human rights abuser, and adopt a resolution critical of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is a tundra of human rights as it has the world's worst human rights record: Rights to existence of hundreds of millions of toiling people are wantonly abused due to the unlimited pursuit of profits by the privileged circles including monopoly plutocrats, shuddering murders including gun-related crimes are daily occurrences and racist forces are going so rampant that even the president of the U.S. shrinks up after censuring the racial discrimination by white police.
					
					 It was the U.S. that invaded Afghanistan and Iraq after deceiving mankind and turned them into mayhems of terrorism and genocide. It built secret prisons in different parts of the world, mercilessly killing innocent people and forcing humiliation and disgrace upon them. The brigandish "war on terrorism" launched by it is an unprecedented war to deprive other countries of their national sovereignty and a horrible war to abuse human rights.
					
					 The international arena dealing with human rights should naturally force the above-said war criminals and worst human rights abusers to stand trial and face a stern punishment.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop the political charade and mind its own business as it may cause the above-said council to meet the same miserable end as that of the committee.

articles.title: S. Korean Policy of Confrontation under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Policy of Confrontation under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean relations are now in the grip of uncontrollable crisis. This is the inevitable result of the criminal "policy towards the north" pursued by the south Korean authorities.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					The watchword of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" spelled out by the south Korean conservative authorities is a very sinister theory of confrontation as it set the settlement of the nuclear issue as a precondition for improving the inter-Korean relations, a heinous policy of aggression to realize the treacherous "unification of systems" and a wild ambition for invading the DPRK, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 This watchword is, to all intents and purposes, nothing but an echo of foreign forces' assertion that the "north should dismantle its nukes first." It represents the traitorous and anti-reunification policy of confrontation and war to do harm to the fellow countrymen by intensifying the anti-DPRK nuclear row in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 Pursuant to it, the south Korean ruling forces, a group of traitors, have totally banned dialogue, contacts and visits between the north and the south, claiming that they would adjust the tempo and width of the process to develop the inter-Korean relations and mode of promoting it, depending on "the progress made in the settlement of the north's nuclear issue." Such reckless actions brought to naught the precious achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification thanks to the concerted efforts of the nation and drove the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase of confrontation.
					
					 The above-said watchword is an extremely provocative theory of confrontation and war aimed to realize the wild design for achieving "unification under liberal democracy " by alluring the DPRK into "reform and opening" and escalating the confrontation of systems through an anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 Differing systems have existed in the north and the south of Korea for the last several decades. Therefore, any act of seeking "unification of systems" on the part of one side while denying and slandering the other side's ideology and system can never be helpful to achieving national unity. This will bring nothing but an armed clash and war in the end.
					
					 The DPRK does never want to see the inter-Korean relations collapse. It will no longer remain an onlooker to the behavior of the south Korean authorities sticking to their anti-reunification policy of confrontation, justifying it. All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad will never pardon those anti-reunification traitors who are driving the inter-Korean relations to bankruptcy and collapse.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to act with discretion, properly understanding the trend of the times and the desire of the nation.

articles.title: Policy of Discrimination against Koreans in Japan Blasted
articles.content:
Policy of Discrimination against Koreans in Japan Blasted
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' moves to exclude the Korean schools in Japan from the tuition-free program for senior high schools are an expression of their policy of national discrimination.
					 Minju Joson Saturday says this in a signed commentary. It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese government is duty-bound under international law to ensure the right of the Korean schools in Japan to education. 
					
					 Any overseas citizen of a sovereign state has the right to be protected by law in any country and it is the principled requirement of international law and relations to guarantee him or her such right. The Korean schools in Japan are legitimate national education institutions under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), a dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK. Therefore, they have an equal right to education with Japanese schools and it is natural for the Japanese government to ensure them the right to education. 
					
					 The students who are studying at the Korean schools in Japan are the descendants of those Koreans who were forcibly taken to Japan by the Japanese imperialists in the past. So the Japanese government is under moral obligation to ensure them the right to education. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, however, are leaving no means untried to exclude the Korean schools from the program at any cost. Lurking behind this is the sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to impose heavy financial burden on the Korean schools in a bid to stamp out national education, the most important lifeline of Chongryon, and escalate their moves against Chongryon and the DPRK.
					
					 Intolerable is such act of violating independent rights of citizens of other nation and country in breach of universally recognized norms of international law.
					
					 The Japanese government should squarely face up to the reality and fairly solve the issue of excluding the Korean schools in Japan from the tuition-free program.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' persistent acts of institutionally and administratively discriminating against the Koreans in Japan to suppress them while restricting and violating their democratic national rights will invite bitterer international shame and criticism, the commentary warns.

articles.title: Struggle for Peace against War Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Peace against War Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on March 8 to denounce the large-scale joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers.
					 The statement pointed out that the bellicose forces finally started the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises aimed at invading the DPRK, defying the strong protest and criticism by people at home and abroad.
					
					 The U.S. is threatening the DPRK through test nuclear war maneuvers while paying lip-service to "denuclearization", it charged.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. stop at once the DPRK-targeted war maneuvers and withdraw its troops and nuclear equipment from south Korea.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen will strongly react to the war moves of the U.S. and the dictatorial regime in the spirit of "By our nation itself", the statement said, calling for a vigorous struggle against war, for the withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea and the conclusion of a peace treaty.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves against DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves against DPRK Flayed
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration in an interview with "Voice of People", an Internet broadcasting service, attacked the puppet authorities' policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					 He recalled that in February last the authorities disallowed under the pretexts of "security", "maintenance of order" and the like the working-level contact with media organizations in the north intended to discuss the joint work for marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and other issues.
					
					 If the "government" wishes to make even a little success in the inter-Korean relations, it should not block non-governmental exchange, cooperation and exchange in the media field in particular, he said.
					
					 He urged the authorities to refrain from doing such foolish acts as making a mockery of the people and depending on foreign forces any longer and admit the injustice of their policy of confrontation with the DPRK and drop it at once, though belatedly.
					
					 Media persons will wage a dynamic movement to implement the inter-Korean declarations and get the "National Security Law" abolished, he declared.

articles.title: S. Korea: Settlement of "Comfort Women" Issue Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Settlement of "Comfort Women" Issue Urged
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Women's Solidarity, the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps and the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea at a Wednesday rally held in Seoul on March 10 urged the "assemblies" across south Korea to positively opt for adopting a resolution on the settlement of the issue related to the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					At the rally speakers said that 14 city and county "assemblies" including those in Kyonggi, North Jolla and South Kyongsang provinces adopted resolutions demanding a solution to the said issue and such action is gaining in scope.
					
					The dynamic campaign for adopting similar resolutions is now under way not only in south Korea but also in Japan, they noted.
					
					They held that the authorities and all other "assemblies" should more actively participate in the said campaign in support of their action.

articles.title: S. Korea: Intensified Movement for Reunification Called for
articles.content:
S. Korea: Intensified Movement for Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century, the chairman of the Students Committee of the Democratic Labor Party and representatives of other organizations in south Korea at round-table talks held  in Seoul on Feb. 27 called upon all the youth and students to turn out in a more vigorous movement for national reunification on the occasion of the 10th publication anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, aware of the duty they assumed before the times.
					 At the round-table talks speakers charged that the present regime totally denied the inter-Korean declarations and has pursued an anachronistic policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen, thus driving the south-north relations to a catastrophe.
					
					 The reunification of the country is the ardent desire of all the Koreans, they said, stressing that such problems concerning people's livelihood in south Korea as the settlement of the economic crisis, registration fee and unemployment of young people can be fundamentally solved only when the country is reunified.

articles.title: Egyptian and Britain Assail Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Egyptian and Britain Assail Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt released a statement on Monday in denunciation of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off in south Korea.
					 Noting that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities launched the joint military exercises for aggression against the DPRK despite the warnings of the DPRK and the unanimous protest of the world peace-loving people, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. turned aside the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty and kicked off the exercises with south Korea, thus revealing its true colors as an aggressor and wrecker of peace and stability and driving the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt demands that the U.S. stop at once the anti-DPRK war games, withdraw its forces from south Korea and immediately accept the proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 We call upon all the progressive and peace-loving forces of the world to lift up their voices of protest against the U.S.-south Korea military exercises for aggression and express solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The Staffordshire, Britain, Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, too, made public a statement on Mar. 6 condemning the exercises.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers should be aware that any threat and blackmail can never work on socialist Korea, the statement said, calling on the public of Britain to extend support and encouragement to the Korean people in the efforts for national reunification and on the British government swim with the trend of the times opposing the war exercises in south Korea.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Venezuela
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A national seminar of Venezuela on the Juche idea was held in Falcon State on Feb. 26.
					 Speeches were made there by Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, Diego Antonio Rivero, chairman of the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association and others.
					
					 The speakers proved in depth the validity and vitality of the immortal Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Noting that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has steadily enriched the Juche idea as required by the developing reality, they praised his undying exploits for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 They stressed that his ideas and theories show the bright road ahead of the world progressives striving to build an independent new society.
					
					 Referring to the signal achievements made by the Korean people in the drive to build a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il while smashing every obstructive move of the imperialists, they expressed the resolution to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Granja Cooperativa de Migok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Granja Cooperativa de Migok
						
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon que entro en la agricultura del ano nuevo.
					Sobre todo, recorrio el reconstruido Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de esa granja que obtuvo tres veces el titulo de Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones.
					
					Viendo los datos historicos exhibidos, subrayo que bajo la sabia direccion y minuciosa atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la aldea de Migok se ha convertido en un paraiso del pueblo donde se cosechan abundantes cereales y agrego que las imborrables hazanas revolucionarias de el brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					Tras evaluar altamente los orgullosos meritos realizados por la granja en el pasado, dio vueltas por el criadero de paludinas construido nuevamente.
					
					Las experiencias practicas adquiridas por varias granjas verifican que el abonamiento y cuidado de arrozales con la paludina constituyen el metodo ventajoso para elevar el rendimiento de arrozal ahorrando la mano de obra y el producto agroquimico, senalo el Dirigente y anadio que todas las granjas deben perfeccionar ese metodo para introducirlo ampliamente.
					
					Destaco que hoy dia, la tendencia de desarrollo de agricultura es el metodo organico que no requiere el abono y otros productos quimicos y continuo que para solucionar ese problema, es necesario aplicar activamente dicho metodo y otras nuevas tecnologias de cultivo.
					
					Llegado a las parcelas de la Brigada No.1 de Produccion Agricola, se cercioro del estado de preparativos de la agricultura pisando los linderos de arrozal donde hacia viento frio.
					
					Mirando las modernas casas y las instalaciones higienicas y culturales acondicionadas comoda y limpiamente, se puso satisfecho varias veces de que la aldea de Migok haya adquirido el pintoresco panorama socialista, destacando que ella luce mas hermosa cada vez que la vea.
					
					Ese dia, el Dirigente se encontro con los jefes de brigadas y subequipos de trabajo quienes resultaron ejemplares en la produccion de cereales y les estimulo cordialmente. 
					
					Podemos encontrarnos en todas partes de la llanura cooperativista con numerosos patriotas fervientes quienes apoyaron fielmente al partido con el arroz, senalo y destaco que la mas ventajosa economia rural socialista de nuestro pais se fortalece y se desarrolla cada dia mas gracias a tales firmes y fieles revolucionarios campesinos que defienden firmemente la trinchera rural.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la granja.
					
					Senalo que solo en los ultimos anos en que se debia superar las dificultades de toda indole, se libro a lo largo del pais la lucha por la construccion rural y de esta manera, se ha sentado la solida base para aumentar trascendentalmente la produccion agricola.
					
					Subrayo que este exito brillante ha sido la firme garantia que permitira entrar dignamente en las puertas a la gran potencia prospera resolviendo definitivamente el problema agricola, el del campesinado y el rural de nuestro pais.
					
					Enseno que al librarse energicamente las 3 revoluciones en el campo y fortalecerse la ayuda al campo y la direccion estatal a las granjas cooperativas, se realizan rapidamente la claseobrerizacion del campesino y la industrializacion de la agricultura y se disminuyeron considerablemente las diferencias entre la ciudad y el campo que renueva constantemente su aspecto.
					
					Indico que esta realidad es la muestra clara de la justeza y la gran vitalidad de las tesis sobre el problema rural socialista presentadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y del  ventajoso sistema de la economia rural socialista de nuestro pais.
					
					El frente agricola es el principal en la lucha por el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo, dijo y subrayo que todo el pais y todo el pueblo deben registrar un cambio trascendental en la produccion agricola concentrando de continuo en la rama todas las fuerzas.
					
					Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que esta granja cumplira magnificamente tambien en este ano el papel de vanguardia en la materializacion de la orientacion del partido de dar prioridad a la agricultura.
					
					ã€€Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, Choe Ryong Hae, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Continua funcion artistica en Hamhung
articles.content:
Continua funcion artistica en Hamhung
						
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Gran Teatro de Hamhung es la sede de la funcion que ofrecen en estos dias el Conjunto Artistico Provincial de Hamgyong del Sur y las entidades artisticas centrales para festejar la inauguracion de la moderna Fabrica de Vinalon que significo el gran jubilo nacional. 
					La narracion y coro "Esto es el gran jubilo de todo el pais", el solo femenino "Gracias, Generalisimo    Kim Il Sung" y el cuarteto femenino "Vinalon es el orgullo de mi pais" hicieron a los espectadores recordar que la sabia orientacion del Presidente   Kim Il Sung fue el factor que dio inicio a la historia de desarrollo de la autoctona industria de vinalon. 
					
					En otras piezas como el solo masculino "Trueno en el pico Jong Il", el quinteto femenino y coro "Brindemos", la narracion y coro "Mi pais donde se realizan los ideales" y "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta", etc. los ejecutantes elogiaron las inmortales proezas del Dirigente    Kim Jong Il quien realizo ingentes esfuerzos por convertir el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero en la gran base quimica general de la epoca del Songun. 
					
					Alabaron tambien en tono patetico a los obreros coreanos que en acato al noble proposito de los Grandes Hombres sin iguales, realizaron el milagro de terminar en un corto plazo la enorme obra de construccion haciendo uso de su heroismo masivo y abnegacion inigualable.

articles.title: ATCC critica complot anti-RPDC que se teje detras de Consejo de DDHH
articles.content:
ATCC critica complot anti-RPDC que se teje detras de Consejo de DDHH
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos trata de malemplear la reunion del Consejo de los Derechos Humanos de la ONU, que se efectua en Ginebra, en su sucio complot politico contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El imperio recurre a todas las artimanas agrupando a las fuerzas seguidoras con el fin de inventar en esa ocasion el "proyecto de resolucion" contra la RPDC que estipule entre otras cosas el mantenimiento del sistema de "relator especial encargado de la situacion de DDHH del Norte de Corea".
					
					Esto significa otro imperdonable atentado a la soberania y la dignidad de la RPDC y flagrante violacion de DDHH y democracia.
					
					Esa payasada de EE.UU. persigue la meta de mellar la imagen de la muy digna RPDC y acabar con su idea y regimen.
					
					DDHH son precisamente el derecho estatal y viceversa.
					
					Desde mucho antes, el imperio vino violando cruelmente el derecho estatal y los DDHH de otros paises y pueblos usando este tema y la democracia, ideales universales de la sociedad internacional, como aparato de intervencion en los asuntos internos.
					
					Debido a los brutales alborotos de "DDHH" de EE.UU., el derecho democratico de muchos paises y naciones del mundo, que desean establecer el regimen social conveniente a la situacion del pais y la demanda de su pueblo y vivir de modo independiente, se vio violado despiadadamente.
					
					La sociedad internacional disolvio en 2006 la Comision de Derechos Humanos de la ONU a fin de acabar con la arbitrariedad ininterrumpida de EE.UU. en los escenarios internacionales que tratan los DDHH e instauro nuevamente el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU.
					
					EE.UU., que al principio trataba de obstaculizar la fundacion de ese consejo, cambio de repente su posicion para hacerse partidario de la iniciativa y pais miembro con el fin de alcanzar sus siniestros objetivos.
					
					Lo unico que hace el imperio en el consejo es amparar y proteger las practicas de violacion de DDHH en Israel y otros paises, por una parte, y por la otra, violar la soberania de los paises independientes antiyanquis como Cuba.
					
					Sobre todo, al convertir a los "relatores especiales" en sus fantoches, trata de emplearlos en politizar y abordar el problema de DDHH de manera selectiva y con la pauta de doble rasero.
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, nuestro pais no reconocera en el futuro el fantasmal sistema de "relator especial encargado de la situacion de DDHH del Norte de Corea", residuo de la ya desaparecida comision de DDHH de la ONU, y rechaza tajantemente el "proyecto de resolucion" anti-RPDC de caracter ilegal. 
					
					  Para desarrollar sus actividades conforme a la aspiracion de la sociedad internacional que se opone a la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero en el trato de DDHH, el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU debe nombrar primero al relator especial que cuestione a EE.UU., reconocido como peor violador de DDHH del mundo, y aprobar un proyecto de resolucion contra este imperio. 
					
					  Este pais es el mas atrasado en el campo de DDHH y el infierno de DDHH de la edad media, donde se viola flagrantemente el derecho a la vida de cientos de millones de masas trabajadoras debido a las insaciables ambiciones de lucro de unos monopolios y otros privilegiados y ocurren casi todos los dias los asesinatos espeluznantes como los crimenes de uso de armas. 
					
					Ademas, las fuerzas racistas campean tanto que hasta el presidente debio tener cuidado luego de censurar el acto de discriminacion racial de la policia de raza blanca. 
					
					  EE.UU. lanzo la invasion armada contra Afganistan e Iraq enganando a la humanidad y los convirtio en la escena caotica de terror y matanza. Ademas, instalo por doquier de este planeta las carceles secretas donde se matan y se humillan cruelmente los presos inocentes. 
					
					  Esta bandidesca "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. es la brutal guerra para la usurpacion del poder estatal y la eliminacion de DDHH, nunca vista en la historia.
					
					  Los escenarios internacionales relacionados con los DDHH deben sentar al banquillo de acusados a los criminales de guerra y peores violadores de DDHH de EE.UU. y condenarlos a duras penas. 
					
					  Seria mejor a EE.UU. que se limpie su propia nariz abandonando su complot politico que puede llevar al Consejo de DDHH de la ONU al fin vergonzoso a que habia llegado su antecesora comision.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia politica de discriminacion nacional de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia politica de discriminacion nacional de Japon
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, los reaccionarios japoneses intentan excluir las escuelas de los coreanos residentes en Japon de la lista de las escuelas superiores subsidiadas para que la educacion se imparta gratuitamente.
					En un comentario individual divulgado este sabado, el periodico Minju Joson califica esa siniestra medida de una muestra de la sucia politica de discriminacion nacional de los reaccionarios japoneses, y continua:
					
					En vista de ley internacional, el gobierno japones tiene la obligacion de asegurar el derecho a la ensenanza de las escuelas coreanas en su pais. 
					
					  En cualquier pais los ciudadanos en ultramar de un Estado soberano tienen el derecho a ser protegidos por la ley.
					
					El principio de la ley y relaciones internacionales exige tambien garantizar los derechos de ellos. 
					
					  Las escuelas coreanas en Japon son legitimos organos de educacion nacional que administra la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos en Japon), digna entidad de ciudadanos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en ultramar. Por eso, tienen el derecho a la educacion igualitario con las escuelas japonesas, el cual debe garantizar el gobierno japones. 
					
					  Los alumnos de las escuelas coreanas son los descendientes de los coreanos trasladados en contra de su voluntad a ese pais isleno por los imperialistas nipones en el pasado. Pues, asegurarles el derecho a la educacion es la obligacion moral del gobierno japones. 
					
					  Al excluir las escuelas coreanas de la lista de las escuelas subsidiadas, los reaccionarios japoneses intentan imponer a ellas enormes cargas financieras, de modo que fuera acabada la educacion nacional, asunto mas vital de la Chongryon.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, tratan de lanzar mas abiertamente la campana anti-Chongryon y anti-RPDC.
					
					  Nunca puede ser tolerado ese acto que viola los derechos soberanos de los ciudadanos de otra nacion y otro pais y el reconocido reglamento del derecho internacional.
					
					 El gobierno japones debe ser imparcial en incluir las escuelas coreanas en la lista de las escuelas superiores subsidiadas para la ensenanza gratuita.
					
					  Si los reaccionarios japoneses siguen restringiendo y violando los derechos nacionales y democraticos de los coreanos residentes en su pais y practicando la discriminacion institucional y administrativa que los acosa y reprime, tendran que pasar mayor verguenza y enfrentar las criticas en la arena internacional.
